songs.title: We Were Born For This
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Look at all the choices, the choices in this world
World spreading no freedom, freedom for the boys and the girls
But the boys and the girls they don’t know, what love is like
Love is like appreciation mixed in a double cup of Sprite

[Pre-Chorus]
So can we go?
No left or right
You go your way
And I'll go mine

[Chorus x2]
Cause this is my time
And I won’t waste it
Thinking 'bout what you gotta say
Cause I'm here to stay

[Verse 2]
Look at all the places, places that I've been
It doesn't come easy, you gotta have strength
And when it goes down and it’s all said and done
You gotta stand up so there’s no need to run

[Pre-Chorus]
And now that I've made it
I won’t look back no
Sacrifice what meant the most to me
The most to me, yes I did

[Chorus x2]

[Outro]
Look at all the people standing outside
So dedicated
Your love doesn't go unrecognised
Your love doesn't go unrecognised
